findings.title: LO1. TLS 1.0 Enabled
findings.description: TLS 1.0 protocol is enabled which is an outdated and insecure protocol.

findings.title: Weaknesses in application's architecture validation
findings.description: The application's architecture exhibited vulnerabilities related to validation failures, specifically in transaction APIs, allowing negative values in transactions and lacking thorough testing.

findings.title: Misconfigurations in TLS and security headers
findings.description: The audit revealed misconfigurations in the application, notably concerning the use of outdated TLS 1.0 and missing security headers.

findings.title: Deficiency in application logging
findings.description: The application was found to lack adequate logging, which is essential for auditing by external services.
